title: I have a pixel 3 with att the caller on then other end cannot hear me. This not an art&t issue.
content: The caller on the other end can't hear me. Also voice cut in out during calls.  This has to be phone voice call issue sice I have not had trouble with dou calls or Whatsapp calls. I've reset and factory reset and made sure I have the most updated software. Please help or I'm trading this thing in.
